summary: Egotistical vaudevillian Bill Miller basks in the limelight with his successful musical-comedy act, but his success is due to his unheralded second banana.
cast: Dean Martin|Jerry Lewis|Polly Bergen|Marion Marshall|Eddie Mayehoff|Richard Erdman|Frances Bavier|Oliver Blake|Danny Borzage|Morgan Brown|Steve Carruthers|Danny Davenport|Charles Evans|Franklyn Farnum|Tommy Farrell|George Ford|Rudy Germane|Joe Gilbert|Herschel Graham|Don Haggerty|Robert Haines|Jerry Hausner|Percy Helton|Harry Hines|Shep Houghton|Nolan Leary|Norman Leavitt|Freeman Lusk|Donald MacBride|Hank Mann|Harold Miller|Frank O'Connor|Monty O'Grady|Eddie Parks|Edwin Rochelle|Michael Ross|Jeffrey Sayre|Charles Smith|Cap Somers|Al Thompson|Mary Treen
title: El cantante loco
